calculateScore() - Method in class Model.Player
accessor: Calculates and returns the score of the player
Postcondition: The score of the player has been returned
calculateScore() - Method in interface Model.PlayerADT
accessor: Calculates and returns the score of the player
Postcondition: The score of the player has been returned
calculateScoreOfPlayer(Player) - Method in class Controller.Controller
accessor: calculates the score a player and returns it
Precondition: Player must not be null
Postcondition: Score of the player has been returned
Card - Interface in Model.Cards
The interface for all cards, contains methods to get and set the message of a card, its value, its picture and its title
CardDeck - Class in Model.Cards
This class is a deck of cards (basically and ArrayList of Card classes) and methods are included to get the top card, to add a card at the bottom of the deck, shuffle the deck, etc.
CardDeck(ArrayList<Card>, DeckType) - Constructor for class Model.Cards.CardDeck
Constructor: Constructs a new CardDeck and sets the type of the card deck.
CardDeck(DeckType) - Constructor for class Model.Cards.CardDeck
Constructor: Constructs a new CardDeck and sets the type of the card deck.

CardDeckTest() - Constructor for class JUnitTests.CardDeckTest
 
CardInventoryUI - Class in View
A window that contains all the cards of a player
CardInventoryUI(ArrayList<DealCard>) - Constructor for class View.CardInventoryUI
constructor: Creates a new Window and initializes some buttons and panels
postconditions: Creates a new Window and shows to the player the deal cards in his inventory
changeDiceImage(Pawn, Dice) - Method in class View.GraphicUI
Transformer: Changes the dice image for one of the players
Precondition: The pawn and the dice must not be null
Postcondition: Image has been changed
changeOutputPanelMessage(String) - Method in class View.GraphicUI
Transformer: Changes the text of the output panel
Postcondition: The text has been changed
cldr - Variable in class View.PayDayCards
 
Controller - package Controller
 
Controller - Class in Controller
Controller is the master of the game and controls all of the operations executed
Controller() - Constructor for class Controller.Controller
constructor: Constructs a new Controller and sets the game as eligible to start .
postcondition: constructs a new Controller,with 2 new players new board, 4 new card decks, the graphicalUI contructor is called and initialize some boolean variables some int or boolean variables.So,is responsible for creating a new game and initializing it.
Controller.DiceRollListener - Class in Controller
The action listener of the "Roll Dice" buttons of the graphical user interface
Controller.EndTurnListener - Class in Controller
The action listener of the "End Turn" buttons of the graphical user interface
Controller.GetCardsListener - Class in Controller
The action listener of the "My Deal Cards" buttons of the graphical user interface
Controller.GetLoanListener - Class in Controller
The action listener of the "Get Loan" buttons of the graphical user interface
crypto() - Method in class Controller.Controller
Transformer: The Thursday crypto gui popup window is called and if the player plays and wins money is added, if he loses money is subtracted and if he doesn't play or the price remains the same nothing happens
postcondition: The cryptoPopUp of the gui has been called and the money has been added or subtracted from the player, or nothing has happened if he decides not to buy crypto or the price remains the same
cryptoPopUp(Dice) - Method in class View.GraphicUI
The player selects if he wants to bid 300$ on a cryptocoin, 1 if the price increased, if it dropped 2 is returned and if he didn't bid or the price remained the same 0 is returned
